Package Summary
Package
Description
org.db.connecting
Package that have files responsible for Establishing connection with DB Getting all data from DB Getting details for logging in
org.db.interfaces
Package that have functional interfaces
org.db.manage
Package that have files responsible for Adding or deleting questions Sorting DB Preparing String to further usage Changing password/login Storing current table Getting answers and questions in String array Getting info about records in current table
org.db.reset
Package that have file responsible for reseting whole DB
org.db.tables
Package that have files responsible for managing tables
org.exceptions.exceptions
Package that contains custom exceptions: CustomException
org.exceptions.file
Package that contains file responsible for writing error log ERRORS
org.exceptions.ui
Package that contains UI version of exceptions ExceptionUI
org.file.writing
Package that have file responsible for writing down what happened when program was running
org.ui
Package that have Other packages Main class
org.ui.admin
Package that have files responsible for letting user set up correctly quiz
org.ui.admin.others
Package that have files responsible for same things as mother package but there wasn't anymore space, so I moved it here
org.ui.hq
Package that have file responsible for calling other classes that show questions
org.ui.questions
Package that have files responsible for Showing questions Keeping track of score
org.ui.score
Package that have files responsible for letting user know if his answer was correct
org.ui.tutorial
Package that have files that are responsible for showing tutorials
